item.title: Doggie SkillScape V1 Yell help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && muted == 0 && playerRights > 2) { String text = command.substring(5); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[owner] - " + playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1); }

Read full topic

item.title: Doggie SkillScape V1 Yell help
item.dc:creator: @totalystylin1 totalystylin1
item.description:
@totalystylin1 wrote:

[code]will someone make these command’s say like, if your an owner, it say [owner]Alex (yell text)?

[code=] } else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "*****");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "*********");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (hasegg == 0) {
            sendMessage("This is a members feature!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }[/code]
